Class TextButton

  • java.lang.Object
    • greenfoot.Actor
      • TextButton

  • public class TextButton
extends greenfoot.Actor
    A Generic Button to display text that is clickable. Owned by a World, which controls click capturing. Buttons are modular, you can modify the button text, backcolour, size, and text colour.
    Version:
    v0.1.5
    Author:
    Jordan Cohen, Kevin Biro
